item.title: NBA Playoffs Cavaliers Get on the Board in Game 3 With Blowout of Pacers Donovan Mitchell Drops 43 Points
item.description:
üèÄ Cavaliers Dominate Game 3 Behind Mitchell’s 43 Points, Cut Series Deficit to 2-1

The Cleveland Cavaliers responded like contenders in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference semifinals, defeating the Indiana Pacers 126-104 on the road. With the win, the Cavaliers now trail the series 2-1 heading into a critical Game 4 on Sunday.

üîë Key Highlights

  • Donovan Mitchell:

    • 43 points (14-of-29 FG), 9 rebounds, 5 assists
    • Second consecutive 40+ point game

  • Cavs Get Healthy:
